name: PT. JEDIDIAH GLOBAL TRANSPORT
greetingText: For Pak Ivan, Bu Sylvia, and Everyone :)
wishText: Happy 10th birthday to PT. JEDIDIAH GLOBAL TRANSPORT. Let this day be full of joy and celebration. There aren't many words to say, just thank you for giving the opportunity to join here and make it a family. Always be the best company because YOUR TRUST IS OUR COMMITMENT :)
